msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: vmassol
msg: Allows the user to override the Clover jar. This is especially useful as the Clover jars are license-signed for a specific project so you might want to use different jars for different projects.

author: vmassol
msg: I hadn't seen there was an issue on this... Funnily I picked the same property name as the one Ben suggested! :-)
